info.title: Project Demand Category and Type - Read
info.description: This service enables you to read project demand categories and types along with their descriptions. You can use this service, for example, to retrieve supported values for the corresponding fields in the **Project Demand** entity of the **Project Demand** API, or to make the descriptions of the categories and types available for your custom application.

x-sap-shortText: Read project demand categories and types using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Project Demand Category and Type Integration(SAP_COM_0925)
[Project Control - Resourcing and Procurement(4RF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4RF " Link To BP ")
[Project Control - Resourcing and Procurement(PRF)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/PRF " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Content-Type: application/http
